import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-sidevar', templateUrl: './sidevar.component.html', styleUrls: ['./sidevar.component.css'] }) export class SidevarComponent { ngOnInit(){ } slider_1= true; slider_2= true; slider_3= true; cambiarEstadoMenu(id:number){ switch(id){ case 1: this.slider_1=!this.slider_1; break; case 2: this.slider_2=!this.slider_2; break; case 3: this.slider_3=!this.slider_3; break; } } }
